content:
Welcome to the user guide for the Loyalty Platform! This guide will walk you through the features and functionality of the platform so that you can use it to track and reward your customers who make repeat transactions, as well as gain additional buyer insights.

Getting Started
To get started with the Loyalty Platform, you will need to create an account and log in. Once you have logged in, you will be taken to your dashboard, which provides an overview of your loyalty program and customer activity.

Tracking Repeat Transactions
To track your customers' repeat transactions, navigate to the "Customers" section of your dashboard. Here, you will see a list of your customers and their transaction history. You can filter this list by various criteria, including the number of transactions and the total amount spent. Use these filters to identify your repeat customers and reward them accordingly.

Assigning Rewards
To assign rewards to your customers, navigate to the "Rewards" section of your dashboard. Here, you can create custom rewards and assign them to individual customers or groups of customers. You can also set rules for when rewards are earned, such as after a certain number of transactions or a certain amount spent.

Tracking Customer Data
To track customer data and gain additional buyer insights, navigate to the "Analytics" section of your dashboard. Here, you can view reports and analytics on customer engagement, such as the number of repeat customers and the average purchase amount. You can also track customer behaviour and preferences, such as which products or services they purchase most frequently.

Customizing Your Loyalty Program
To customize your loyalty program, navigate to the "Settings" section of your dashboard. Here, you can set up your program rules and branding, such as the name of your program and the rewards you offer. You can also customize your program to fit your business needs, such as by setting different rewards for different customer segments or by integrating with other marketing platforms.

Getting Help
If you need help using the Loyalty Platform, you can contact our customer support team at any time. Simply navigate to the "Help" section of your dashboard and click "Contact Us" to send a message.

Thank you for choosing the Loyalty Platform! We hope this guide has been helpful in getting you started with the platform.
